settings.heading-text-columns_heading: Wool is one of nature’s true wonders
settings.heading-text-columns_text:
100% renewable, biodegradable, and packed with benefits. It doesn’t deplete the earth’s resources, nor does it contribute to toxic landfill.

Wool is naturally fire-resistant, removes harmful chemicals from the air, and regulates moisture, qualities that few other materials can offer while being completely safe and sustainable.

That’s why we’re proud to say, three cheers for the humble sheep!

Why Wool?

settings.image-with-content_text: Our dedication to sustainability runs through everything we do, from sourcing our wool to creating a circular economy that benefits Kiwi farmers and rural communities. By choosing Wool.Life, you’re not just buying a product, you’re supporting local, creating sustainable returns for New Zealand farmers, and helping to generate jobs in rural areas. See How

settings.image-with-content_text: Wool.Life was born out of a passion for wool’s extraordinary properties and a desire to create real impact in our local economy. Headquartered in Hastings, Hawke’s Bay and led by Managing Director Gareth Mentzer, our team is committed to making wool a go-to choice for consumers who care about sustainability and supporting New Zealand businesses. The Wool.Life team fully believe in the superpowers of wool to deliver innovative products that both enhance everyday life and contribute to a cleaner, greener future for New Zealand. Why Wool?

settings.grid-item_paragraph: We create high-quality, trusted products that redefine how consumers think about wool, showcasing its unmatched potential.
Sustainability is at the core of everything we do, from building strong supplier relationships to producing environmentally friendly products.
Our products are safe to install, safe to use, and safe for the environment, ensuring peace of mind for everyone.
We believe in being upfront and honest. No-bull communications and actions are the backbone of Wool.Life.
Explore our products and join us in making a positive difference for your home, your garden, and our planet, one wool product at a time.
